AbstractOctree.h File Reference

Octree structure for collision detection the user must impliment the pure virtual checkCollisionOnNode method for appropriate collision also the templated class must have a getPosition method that returns a vector of the correct template type and a getRadius method to return a bounding radius of the object as a float may update this to do bounding radius or bounding box at some stage. Detailed Description

Octree structure for collision detection the user must impliment the pure virtual checkCollisionOnNode method for appropriate collision also the templated class must have a getPosition method that returns a vector of the correct template type and a getRadius method to return a bounding radius of the object as a float may update this to do bounding radius or bounding box at some stage.
